title: Filo v3.1 + Patch By ChattChitto
description:
Filo v3.1 + Patch

.exe File Format (Setup File - Patch - Instructions)

***********************************************************************************
Filo enables you to modify the date, time, and attribute properties of selected files and folders. It is particularly handy for giving files and folders the same time and date stamp, and modifying sets of files based on their existing attributes. For instance, you might want to remove the read-only attribute from a group of files copied from a CD-ROM, stamp a CD-ROM image with the same time and date before recording it, or restore folder time properties lost during copy operations.

Filo features a filter to modify files and folders selectively, a drag and drop interface to get or set properties, a log section, and a test mode to preview operations and collect statistics.

If you need to keep files and folders in a certain order or state, Filo is an effective alternative to the limited Explorer and command line Touch programs.

Requirements:
--------------
1MB of free disk space

What's new in this version:
----------------------------
Added the "Set Folder Time to Content" feature to restore folder time properties lost during copy operations.

OS:
----
Windows 2000, WinXP, Windows 2003, Windows Vista Starter, Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium.
